Name: Maximize Sprint Velocity
Description: Increase average story points completed per sprint

Name: Minimize Bug Count
Description: Reduce the number of blockers/bugs detected per sprint

Name: Maximize Feature Delivery
Description: Complete as many features as possible per release

Name: Minimize Task Effort
Description: Reduce total effort for tasks in sprint backlog

Name: Maximize Team Availability
Description: Ensure team members have high availability

Name: Minimize Sprint Duration
Description: Keep sprint durations within planned time frames

Name: Maximize Product Owner Availability
Description: Ensure product owner is available for backlog management

Name: Maximize Stakeholder Engagement
Description: Increase stakeholder participation in sprint reviews

Name: Minimize Delay in Resolving Blockers
Description: Reduce time from blocker detection to resolution

Name: Maximize Team Skill Level
Description: Ensure high average skill level in team members
